description: Nationalism, patriotism and poverty on show in the Russian town of Kolomna.
title: Strongman Putin stokes patriotism in small-town Russia
title_page: Strongman Putin stokes patriotism in small-town Russia - BBC News
maintext: "And much of Russia's land went to other countries, which is not right. Like Ukraine, Belarus, parts of the Baltic states and part of Kazakhstan. You must make sure this land is returned to Greater Russia. And don't be scared if you hear people say, 'There mustn't be war.' There will be war anyway."
